code: import React,{useState}from'react';import SearchIcon from'@mui/icons-material/Search';import{filterStyle}from'../../../Utils/MaterialUiStyles';import{IconButton}from'@mui/material';import'./SearchBar.scss';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SearchBar({inputChange,searchFunction}){const[input,setInput]=useState('');const handleInputChange=event=>{setInput(event.target.value);inputChange(event.target.value);};const search=()=>{searchFunction(input);};return _jsxs("div",{className:"searchbar_containr",children:[_jsx("input",{className:"input_text_search",placeholder:"Search...",value:input,onChange:handleInputChange}),_jsx(IconButton,{sx:{width:'20%',marginLeft:'1vw'},onClick:search,children:_jsx(SearchIcon,{sx:filterStyle})})]});}export default SearchBar;
